members.name: getAliasesByName
members.doc: Get the aliases of a class by the class name
members.short_doc: Get the aliases of a class by the class name ...

members.name: getNameByAlias
members.doc: Get the name of a class by its alias.
members.short_doc: Get the name of a class by its alias. ...

members.name: getNameByAlternate
members.doc: Get the name of a class by its alternate name.
members.short_doc: Get the name of a class by its alternate name. ...

members.name: getNamesByExpression
members.doc:
Converts a string expression to an array of matching class names. An expression can either refers to class aliases or class names. Expressions support wildcards:

 // returns ['Ext.window.Window']
var window = Ext.ClassManager.getNamesByExpression('widget.window');

// returns ['widget.panel', 'widget.window', ...]
var allWidgets = Ext.ClassManager.getNamesByExpression('widget.*');

// returns ['Ext.data.Store', 'Ext.data.ArrayProxy', ...]
var allData = Ext.ClassManager.getNamesByExpression('Ext.data.*');

params.name: exclude
params.doc: An object keyed by class name containing classes to exclude from the returned classes. This must be provided if accumulate is set to true.

params.name: accumulate
params.doc: Pass true to add matching classes to the specified exclude object.

members.short_doc: Converts a string expression to an array of matching class names. ...

members.name: select
members.doc:
This method returns a selector object that produces a selection of classes and delivers them to the desired receiver.

The returned selector object has the same methods as the given receiver object but these methods on the selector accept a first argument that expects a pattern or array of patterns. The actual method on the receiver will be called with an array of classes that match these patterns but with any patterns passed to an exclude call removed.

For example:

 var sel = inventory.select({
         require: function (classes) {
             console.log('Classes: ' + classes.join(','));
         }
     });

 sel.exclude('Ext.chart.*').exclude('Ext.draw.*').require('*');

 // Logs all classes except those in the Ext.chart and Ext.draw namespaces.

params.name: scope
params.doc: Optional scope to use when calling receiver methods.

return.name: return
return.doc: An object with the same methods as receiver plus exclude.

members.short_doc:
This method returns a selector object that produces a selection of classes and
delivers them to the desired receiver. ...

members.name: setPath
members.doc:
Sets the path of a namespace. For Example:

 inventory.setPath('Ext', '.');
 inventory.setPath({
     Ext: '.'
 });

params.name: name
params.doc: The name of a single mapping or an object of mappings.

params.name: path
params.doc: If name is a String, then this is the path for that name. Otherwise this parameter is ignored.

members.short_doc: Sets the path of a namespace. ...
